metadata.title: CVE-2024-27049 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:wifi: mt76: mt7925e: fix use-after-free in free_irq()From commit a304e1b82808 ("[PATCH] Debug shared irqs"), there is a testto make sure the shared irq handler should be able to handle the unexpectedevent after deregistration. For this case, let's apply MT76_REMOVED flag toindicate the device was removed and do not run into the resource accessanymore.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
